name: Xilonen
title: "Ardent Flames Forge the Soul" Xilonen
desc: The peaks resound, their golden veins gleaming.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Xilonen to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Ehecatl's Roar
skills.desc: Deals ? ?. If Nightsoul's Blessing is attached to self, then regain 1 Nightsoul point.

skills.name: Yohual's Scratch
skills.desc:
Attach Combat Blading Gear to this character, then enter Nightsoul's Blessing and gain 1 Nightsoul point. (This skill cannot be used after the character enters Nightsoul's Blessing)
(Characters with Combat Blading Gear attached can use the Technique: High-Speed Leap)

skills.name: Ocelotlicue Point!
skills.desc: Deals ? ?. Draw 1 card and heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP. Draw 1 additional card for each stack of Source Sample: Geo, and heal 1 additional HP for each stack of Source Sample of another Element.

skills.name: Source Sample
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, create 3 stacks of Source Sample: Geo. When you have Pyro, Hydro, Cryo, or Electro characters on your side, then convert 1 stack of Source Sample: Geo to a Source Sample of the corresponding Element.
